job.title: Lead Node.Js Developer (work from Home) - E comm
job.jobDescription:
Job Description:

We are looking for a highly capable & passionate Node.js lead developer to optimize our web-based application performance. The candidate will collaborate with our front-end developers, design back-end components, and integrate data storage and protection solutions. In addition, the candidate must have experience in grooming, guiding & tracking the work of 3 to 5 subordinates.


Roles and Responsibilities

Duties:

  • Will work with in house team and Canada based team for project execution
  • Will consult with Software Development Manager for business requirements and help in preparing solution architecture for functional & technical specifications
  • Will be delivering requests in sprints as per Agile methodologies; however, will also be capable of working on the SDLC model of project implementation
  • Will groom subordinates to polish their software development skills
  • Will guide and assist subordinates during software development
  • Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
  • Will review subordinate's code and ensure proper codding norms are followed.
  • Will enforce subordinates for maintaining proper version control thru GitHub and assist them during production deployments
  • Will act as a role model for subordinates by setting good examples and work ethics.
  • Will motivate subordinates toward their Job roles and contribute to maintaining a stress-free, positive & lively working environment.
  • Will keep track of day-to-day activity and assist Manager in optimal utilization of resources
  • Will assist subordinates, Project coordinators & Managers in keeping JIRA up to date for tracking projects/issues effectively
  • Will also provide suggestions and opinions for ongoing tech implementations in the DI team as well as in the rest of the company
  • Will perform assembly testing and assist the QA team in testing.
  • Will deploy the code to production and facilitate controlled start for go-live; in case of discrepancy, will roll back the code to the earlier state
  • Will be working on multiple requests at a time, should manage workload effectively
  • Willing to work in shifts to match Canadian time zone, and in case of urgency, provide support during off working hours

Desired Candidate Profile

Expected Competencies:

  • Proficient in NodeJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, API, MongoDB, MySQL.
  • Experience/knowledge with Shopify, React.JS, and JIRA will be added advantage
  • Good understanding of Docker/Kubernetes on a cloud hosting provider like DigitalOcean
  • Experience with non-relational databases (MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase, DynamoDB), designing schemas
  • Understand business requirements & architect Node.JS based technical solutions
  • Design and implement low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
  • Integrate front-end elements with server-side logic.
  • Write reusable, testable, and efficient code
  • Implementation of security and data protection
  • Able to perform security scans and general performance monitoring
  • Integration of data storage solutions may include databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc
  • Experience in implementing cloud-based databases will be added advantage
  • Experience in using source code versioning control using GIT, such as GITHUB
  • Knowledge of SDLC & Agile software development
  • Manage the group of developers; groom, guide & train them for Node.JS development
  • Identify bottlenecks and bugs in the system and develop solutions
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English)
  • Ability to work on multiple projects, manage stress effectively, and deliver projects on time.

Criteria:

  • CTC: as per industry standards.
  • Experience: 5+ years
  • Education: BSC/BE/BTech in Computer Science/IT or equivalent discipline
  • Industry: IT-Software / Software Services
  • Functional Area: IT Software - Programming
  • Role Category: Programming & Design
  • Role: Lead Software Engineer
  • Employment Type: Permanent Job, Full Time
  • Keywords: Node JS, ReactJS, Shopify, MySQL, MongoDB, API

Perks and Benefits


  • Full-time Employment
  • Salary as per industry standard
  • Work from home
  • Open & Lively work culture
  • Ample opportunities to grow & shape your career
  • Health care facility
  • Provident fund

applications.

A positive mindset and can-do attitude.
Forensic attention to detail.
English skills (ability to effectively communicate via written and spoken English).
A passion for software development. It’s not just your career, it’s also your hobby.
You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news,
regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills
current.
You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your
colleagues.

job.jobDescription:
Full Stack Developer

Design, develop, troubleshoot, and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

Job Description

Our Team

The FSGBU in Oracle is responsible to create and deliver financial products of high quality to serve the Banking, Insurance, and financial industries. Our Product enables banks to streamline their trade finance operations, a robust workflow engine enables transparency of the process from initiation to fulfillment, and brings in rich user experience and process efficiencies. Applications are built on Microservice architecture and can be deployed on On-Premise or Cloud model.

Some of the main objectives of the Financials Applications are:

  • Efficiently understanding the framework, processing, and data model of the application being worked on.
  • Efficiently design and develop enhancements to the application
  • Ability to design stateless microservices with independent deployment.
  • Should be able to create RestAPIs.
  • Create all the microservices and services leveraging functional programming features of advanced Java.
  • Capable to support existing application

Your Qualifications

  • BE/MCA in Computer Science or related fields.
  • 4 to 10 years in software development.
  • Full Stack Developer.
  • Excellent coding and design skills in Java/JEE/Rest/Microservices and Database-related technologies.
  • Well-versed in Java/JEE technologies like Application servers, Spring technologies, Kafka, Netflix Conductor, Restful Services, JSON/XML, Eclipse Link, Junit/Spock, CI/CD.
  • Experience in UI Development using tools like Angular JS, OJET etc would be added advantage.
  • Good knowledge of current/emerging technologies and trends.
  • Hands-on with debugging code and troubleshooting.
  • Should have knowledge on Cloud Applications.
  • Experience in Docker, Kubernetes are added advantages.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Should be able to convey thoughts and information clearly.
  • Experience in working with on a Trade Finance/ Corporate Banking domain are added advantages.
  • Should have worked on an Agile Development environment for at least 2 years

Our Ideal Candidate

  • The Candidate should preferably be from a banking domain and a Product-based company. He should have worked in a reputed company.
  • The Candidate is well aware of the microservices patterns.
  • The Candidate should be very active and understand the complete flow of Product design and microservices patterns.

Your Responsibilities

As an integral part of the Financial development team you will be responsible for the following

  • Understand the Functional data model and metamodel for the product you will work on.
  • Design Microservices and understand the fabric for dependent technical microservices.
  • Creating microservices and it’s corresponding RestAPIs Endpoints.
  • Creating test cases and automating using CI CD.
  • Help drive the requirements of the product using Oracle and Open standard tools, technology, and development practices.
  • Working directly with architects to ensure newer capabilities are built applying right design principles
  • Working with remote and geographically distributed teams to enable building the right products, using the right building blocks, and making them consumable by other products easily
  • Be very technically hands-on and own/drive key end-to-end product/services
  • Ensure customer success including delivering fixes/patches as needed
  • Help build high-performance organization including referring, and interviewing top talent to Oracle
  • Open to learning new technologies as per project needs and delivering the same tasks.
